text: Ate uha kahide hana ki jihare phalane prakara de pasu'am de peta vicaî€¼ (baca) hai. Uha sade purasam la'i halala hai ate sadi'am auratam la'i harama. Jekara uha murada hove tam sabha hisedara hana. Alaha jaladi hi unham de isa kathana la'i vi saza devega. Besaka alaha bibekasila ate gi'ana vala hai
